Focus Detection.content: Automatically logs you out when the app loses focus, helping protect your data when switching apps or multitasking.

Shake Detection.content:
Automatically logs you out if the phone is shaken—useful for preventing access if someone grabs your device unexpectedly.

You can adjust the gravity threshold to control the sensor's sensitivity.

TopBar Logout Action.content:
For added security, tapping the title at the top of the screen will immediately log you out.

This feature provides a quick way to secure the app if you’re in a hurry or someone unexpectedly approaches your device.
